I got the same message as frosty about 30 mins into the movie, playing it on my ps3 and this is the first time I got this with any of your DL's

frosty2k11/SupremeClientele - The Cinavia watermark is applied to all movies that are produced or distributed by Sony Columbia now, and it is impossible to remove by re-encoding, so if you are using a PS3, any version that you download will have it unfortunately.

You can try this (works for some, not others):  www*youtube*com/watch?v=2Htgh9L87XY (replace the stars with periods)
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1135084/
Hands down the best quality movies i've seen for a torrent...keep up the good work !!!! THX
